data.title: N Korea accuses US of declaring war
US has not declared war on North Korea and the suggestion is ‘absurd’, says White House

French tourist prevents a bus with 21 passengers from plunging over a 100m (328ft) cliff in the Austrian Alps after the driver, 76, passed out. The passenger leapt from his seat as the vehicle crashed through the wooden roadside guardrail and applied the brake, leaving the bus hanging over the edge.
Muslim surgeon who volunteered to treat Manchester bomb victims stabbed in neck outside mosque in 'hate crime'
Facebook reportedly discovered it had been infiltrated by Russian government hackers months before the election

The Streets Are ‘Not Safe’—San Juan Is Forgotten By the U.S. - The island is not just trying to recover, it’s trying to reconnect with the rest of the world. The situation is disastrous & they are begging for more help.
Puerto Rico officials describe 'apocalyptic' conditions after Hurricane Maria
Microsoft and Facebook just laid a 160-terabits-per-second cable 4,100 miles across the Atlantic
Brazil is set for largest Amazon restoration project ever

Nerve implant 'restores consciousness' to man in vegetative state | Stimulation of the vagus nerve allows patient who has been in a vegetative state for 15 years to track objects with his eyes and respond to simple requests
